title: Mariupol says thousands deported from besieged Ukrainian city - Reuters.com
content: Mariupol says thousands deported from besieged Ukrainian city  Reuters.comView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said Russia's siege of the port city of Mariupol was "a terror that will be remembered for centuries to come", while local authorities said thousands of residents there had been taken by force across the border.
